run_module¶

run_module(root, module, build_script='make.py', osname=None)¶

Runs script build_script in module directory module relative to root of repository root.

Parameters

  • root (str) – Directory of root.

  • module (str) – Name of module.

  • build_script (str) – Name of build script. Defaults to make.py.

  • osname (str, optional) – Name of OS. Used to determine syntax of system command. Defaults to os.name.

Returns

Return type

None

Example

The following code runs the script root/module/make.py.

run_module(root = 'root', module = 'module')
